pr_title: ISPN-11591 InDoubtTxInfoImpl can store status as an Integer

timeline.message: ISPN-11591 InDoubtTxInfoImpl can store status as an Integer
ISPN-11591 InDoubtTxInfoImpl can store status as an Integer

timeline.author: pruivo
pruivo
pruivo

timeline.bodyText: I think it can be removed. This is a private class/package.
timeline.author: pruivo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -149,12 +150,23 @@
        */
       Long getInternalId();
 
+      /**
+       * The value represent transaction's state as described by the {@code status} field.
+       * @return the {@link javax.transaction.Status} or -1 if not set.
+       */
+      int getTxStatus();
+
       /**
        * The value represent transaction's state as described by the {@code status} field. Multiple values are returned
        * as it is possible for an in-doubt transaction to be at the same time e.g. prepared on one node and committed on
        * the other.
+       * @deprecated will be removed in a future version.
        */
-      Set<Integer> getStatus();
+      @Deprecated

timeline.bodyText:
nitpick: we can use org.infinispan.commons.tx.Util.transactionStatusToString() to get the status as string.
if status != -1 :)
timeline.author: pruivo

timeline.message:
ISPN-11591 InDoubtTxInfoImpl can store status as an int

internalId converted from Long to long
